CustomField.description: Populate concerned record's object API name if you want allow user to navigate to the record's view from the toast notification and/or if you want to refresh record's view and/or object's related lists to see the rollback data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populate concerned record's object API name if you want allow user to navigate to the record's view from the toast notification and/or if you want to refresh record's view and/or object's related lists to see the rollback data.
CustomField.label: Object API Name
